about_the_game:
《RockTop》 "is a VR game based on extreme sports - rock climbing. Integrating various elements such as racing, adventure, puzzle solving, and chasing. The player plays a skilled climber who challenges different terrains and mechanisms, using his arm span and agile skills to find the shortest route to the finish line.
There are two modes of the game: challenge mode and online mode.

Challenge mode:
1. There are a total of 3 levels;
2. Players can pass the level by finding the only gem as quickly as possible
3. The shorter the clearance time for each level, the greater the number of stars obtained.

Online mode:
1. A chase game that allows 2-7 players to participate in police catching thieves;
2. Up to 2 police officers and 5 thieves.
3. Each game has a duration of 6 minutes
4. Thieves can win by obtaining all gems during game time
5. During the game time, the thief did not receive all the gems, and the police won;
6. The police can arrest a thief by touching his head with their hands;
7. After being arrested, the thief will return to a random resurrection point and wait for 15 seconds before being resurrected
8. In the game, if you let go or are hit by a mechanism, you will return to a random resurrection point and wait for 3 seconds before being resurrected.

I hope more game enthusiasts can participate in our game discussions, and we will continue to update more levels and new gameplay; We will also optimize the gaming experience based on everyone's feedback.

Join our discord server and share your thoughts! https://discord.gg/vZmXX9kFTp

  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24600 MB available space
